Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema

Interface IBindingMetaschemaModule

All Superinterfaces:
IMetaschemaModule<IBindingMetaschemaModule>, IModule, IModuleExtended<IBindingMetaschemaModule,IModelDefinition,IFlagDefinition,IFieldDefinition,IAssemblyDefinition>
public interface IBindingMetaschemaModule extends IMetaschemaModule<IBindingMetaschemaModule>
A Metaschema module represented as binding to Java classes and fields.
